com.jweb.dao

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jweb.dao.DAO
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressDAO, AuthorDAO, BookDAO, CommentDAO, NewsDAO, NewsletterDAO, UserDAO

    public abstract class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The Data Access Object abstract class.
    Author:
    Julie
    See Also:
    DAOException

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws DAOException
        Connect to the database. Throw a DbException if any SQLException occurs and close the connection if needed.
        Throws:
        DbException
        DAOException

      • prepare

        public void prepare(java.lang.String query)
             throws DAOException
        Prepare a statement
        Parameters:
        query -
        Throws:
        DAOException

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the connection to the database. Ignore any SQLException occurring.

      • select

        public void select()
            throws DAOException
        Retrieve the first row corresponding to the query. A DbException is thrown if any error occurs. Close the connection to the database if needed.
        Throws:
        DbException
        DAOException

      • update

        public void update()
            throws DAOException
        Tries to update a row into the database according to the query passed as parameter
        Throws:
        DAOException

      • insert

        public void insert()
            throws DAOException
        Tries to update a row into the database according to the query passed as parameter
        Throws:
        DAOException

        public void delete()
            throws DAOException
